author: ekoneil
msg: Rework the layout of the files used to build the netui webapp template.
This makes it much simpler to see where the non JAR / TLD files come from and structures them as they end up in the webapp template.
- Ran tests with the NetUI deploy.netui / undeploy.netui targets to make sure that the right files are copied and deleted.

author: reinhard
msg: Learned more about JMeter - now all tests run sequentially

author: cziegeler
msg: ehcache is now in the core

author: erodriguez
msg: Prototype LDAP lookup code, tested against OpenLDAP 2.0.27-8, using SASL GSSAPI, mutual authentication, and high quality of protection on all traffic.
